REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3084 reute r f BC-GE-<GE>-GETS-250-MLN 06-18 0075

TEXT.TITLE: GE <GE> GETS 250 MLN DLR ENGINE ORDER
TEXT.BODY: General Electric Co said it has received contracts worth 250 mln dlrs, including options, to supply its CF6-80C2 engines for the 747-400 and MD-11 airliners ordered from Boeing Co <BA> and McDonnell Douglas Corp <MD> respectively by Thai Airways International. The company said it also received a 16 mln dlr order from Thai Air for CF6-50 engines on a McDonnell Douglas DC-10 Series 30. Reuter
